description.full: - Play both Jack and Kong - No interface to ensure better immersion – get the real cinematic feeling by being in the centre of the action. - Go deeper in Skull Island than the movie, the game features Peter Jackson approved creatures that will not be shown in the movie.
description.short: - Play both Jack and Kong - No interface to ensure better immersion – get the real cinematic feeling by being in the centre of the action. - Go deeper in Skull Island than the movie, the game features Peter Jackson approved creatures that will not be shown in the movie.
